form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, 20537

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE WASHINGTON, D.C. 20537 1. LOOP APPLICANT CENTER OF LOOP TO OBTAIN CLASSIFIABLE FINGERPRINTS 1. USE PRINTER'S INK 2 DISTRIBUTE INK EVENLY ON INKING SLAB 3. WASH AND DRY FINGERS THOROUGHLY 4. ROLL FINGERS FROM MAIL TO NAIL AND AVOID ALLOWING FINGERS TO SLIP 5. BE SURE IMPRESSIONS ARE RECORDED IN CORRECT ORDER 6. IF AN AMPUTATION OR DEFORMITY MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE TO PRINT A FINGER MAKE A MOTATION TO THAT EFFECT IN THE INDIVIDUAL FINGER BLOCK DELTA 7. IF SOME PHYSICAL CONDITION MAKES IT IMPOSSIBLE TO OBTAIN PERFECT IMPRESSIONS SUBMIT THE BEST THAT CAN BE OBTAINED WITH A MEMO STAPLED TO THE CARD EXPLAINING THE CIR CUMSTANCES 8. EXAMINE THE COMPLETED PRINTS TO SEE IF THEY CAN BE CLASSIFIED BEARING IN MIND THAT THE LINES BETWEEN CENTER OF MOST FINGERPRINTS FALL INTO THE PATTERNS SHOWN ON THIS CARD (OTHER PATTERNS OCCUR LOOP AND DELTA MUST SHOW INFREQUENTLY AND ARE NOT SHOWN HERE). 2. WHORL LEAVE THIS SPACE BLANK THIS CARD FOR USE BY: DELTAS 1. LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCIES IN FINGERPRINTING APPLICANTS FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT POSITIONS AND APPLICANTS FOR EMPLOYMENT LICENSES OR PERMITS IN THOSE STATES WITH STATUTES PROVIDING FOR FINGER. PRINTING G AS A REQUISITE FOR THE TYPE OF EMPLOY. MENT. CENSE OR PERMIT TO BE ISSUED. LOCAL AND COUNTY ORDINANCES UNLESS SPECIFICALLY BASED ON ILLEGIBLE PRINT APPLICA LE STATE STATUTES DO NOT SATISFY THIS REQUIRE ENT. A SET OF APPLICANT PRINTS MUST FIRST BE CHECK D THROUGH THE APPROPRIATE STATE IDEN. 56 TIFICATION BUREAU OR, IF NO SUCH BUREAU EXISTS THROUGH CENTRAL AGENCY DESIGNATED FOR SUCH REASON NAME URPOSE W HIN THE STATE ONLY THOSE FINGERPRINTS THESE LINES RUN BY WHICH DISQUALIFYING RECORD HAS BEEN,FOUND DELTAS MUST 3. ARCH IDENTIFICATION RECORD DIVISION TION SHOULD BE SUBMITTED FOR FBI SEARCH IF A NO CURRENT COPY OF AN EXISTING FBI IDENTIFICA FBI RECORD IS REQUIRED SIMPLY SUPPLY NAME FBI NUMBER OR LOCAL ARREST NUMBER AND, IF READILY AVAILABLE THE PRIMARY AND SECONDARY PARTS OF THE FINGERPRINT CLASSIFICATION. 2. U.S. GOVERNMENT AGENCIES IN CONNECTION WITH CLEARANCES IDENTITY OF PRIVATE CONTRACTOR SHOULD BE SHOWN IN SPACE "EMPLOYER AND ADDRESS." THE CONTRIBUTOR IS THE NAME OF AGENCY SUBMITTING THE FINGERPRINT CARD TO THE FBI. FBI NUMBER, IF KNOWN, SHOULD ALWAYS BE FURNISHED IN APPROPRIATE SPACE RECORDED MISCELLANEOUS NO. - RECORD: OTHER ARMED FORCES APR my 1977 NO., PASSPORT NO. (PP), ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. (AR), PORT SECURITY CARD NO. (PS), SELECTIVE SERVICE NO. IDENT. DIV. 58 ARCHES HAVE NO DELTAS (SS), VETERANS' ADMINISTRATION CLAIM NO. (VA). 0.258 (Rev. 4-25-72) * U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE: 1974 - 559-642
